name: Atmosphere Insanity
description:
*Made for GDL game jam using Love2D

Objective
  • Pick up the bubbles of oxygen and throw them to the carbon dioxide poisoned zombies to eliminate them! 
  • Survive from the zombies as long as possible!
Controls
  • Press the arrow keys to move & jump
  • Press the space bar to pickup oxygen and throw it
Credits
  • Background music is "Cast Me King" by Josh Pen-Pierson:
  • Font is "Yoster-Island" by codeman38
  • Libraries I used are Classic (OOP library) and Shack(Screen effects library)
  • Other sound effects and sprites are made by me, using BFXR and Piskel
